name: celsius-info-ts
description: Celsius Wallet Info using read-only Partner Key and API Key

scripts.commit: npm run dev-checkout && tsc && npm run test && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.bump-patch: npm run dev-checkout && npm version patch
scripts.bump-minor: npm run dev-checkout && npm version minor
scripts.bump-major: npm run dev-checkout && npm version major
scripts.release: npm run dev-checkout && git push origin dev && git checkout master && git merge dev && git push origin master && git push --tags && git checkout dev
scripts.release-patch: npm run bump-patch && npm run doc && npm run release
scripts.release-minor: npm run bump-minor && npm run doc && npm run release
scripts.release-major: npm run bump-major && npm run doc && npm run release
scripts.doc: npx typedoc src/index.ts && git add . && git commit -m 'Updated Docs'
scripts.start: if test -f dist/driver.js; then NODE_ENV=production node ./dist/driver.js; else echo 'dist/driver.js not found'; fi
scripts.test: if test -d dist/tests; then npx mocha dist/tests; else echo 'dist/tests not found'; fi

author: Edmund Pfeil <edmundpf@buffalo.edu>
